title: The premises are held on a lease for a term of ten years with a five yearly rent review. The relevant rent review date in this case is 6 th January 2008

The provisions for rent review are contained in Clause 6 of the aforementioned Lease and is stated to be based on ‘market rent’ which is defined in the rent review provisions together with the procedure for dealing with the rent review
The main principal issues between the parties can be summarised as
The Tenant’s representative has contended for a rent of £58,250 (per annum exclusive

I carried out my inspection of the premises on 10 th December 2008 in the afternoon plus a brief re-inspection on Tuesday 10 th February 2009 at which time I also looked externally at the properties which I consider to be comparable to the subject property
This is my first determination as the Lease places upon me an obligation to determine the actual liability for my fees and costs
I will deal with this matter after the parties have had an opportunity to consider this determination
I Philip Andrew Brian Dodd made my first determination on rent in relation to the above property dated 12th

title: At my request the parties have consulted together and rather than making representations to me on the issue of costs
